document.docTitle: Nohawilliamsia M. W. Chase & Whitten 2009, gen. nov.
document.masterDocTitle: A new name for the single species of Nohawilliamsia and corrections in Gomesa (Orchidaceae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A new name for the single species of Nohawilliamsia and corrections in Gomesa (Orchidaceae)

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Jodrell Laboratory, Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew, Richmond, Surrey TW 9 3 DS, UK. E-mail: m. chase @ kew. org

heading.emphasis:
Nohawilliamsia M.W. Chase & Whitten
,
gen. nov.

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type species:
Nohawilliamsia pirarense
(Rchb.f.) M . W . Chase & Whitten

subSubSection.paragraph: Plantae terrestres vel lithophyticae, parvae, pseudobulbi lati oblongi, 1 vel 2 bracteis foliiferis subtenti, folio apicali 1 vel 2. Folia crassa. Inflorescentia lateralis, racemosa, plerumque non ramosa, floribus numerosis. Structura floris Oncidio similis, sed tabula infrastigmatica carenti atque columna brevi. Pollinia dua .
There is at this time only a single species in this genus
